code: @Override public void run() {     try {         partitionDiscoverer.open().         result = partitionDiscoverer.getPartitionLeadersForTopics(topics).     } catch (Throwable t) {         this.error = t.     } finally {         try {             partitionDiscoverer.close().         } catch (Exception e) {             throw new RuntimeException("Error while closing partition discoverer.", e).         }     } }

public List<KafkaTopicPartitionLeader> getPartitions() throws Exception {     try {         this.join().     } catch (InterruptedException e) {         throw new Exception("Partition fetching was cancelled before completion").     }     if (error != null) {         throw new Exception("Failed to fetch partitions for topics " + topics.toString(), error).     }     if (result != null) {         return result.     }     throw new Exception("Partition fetching failed"). }
